pull.title: extension of #1103: encapsulate mapCommands in CRPCTable

issue.title: Encapsulate RPC command dispatch in an array of CRPCCommand's
issue.body: This is an alternate version of pull request #1102, which uses function pointers ("ugly" and less extensible from C++ standpoint, but perhaps cleaner from bitcoin's perspective).

events.message: Encapsulate RPC command dispatch in an array of CRPCCommand's
Expose CRPCTable via bitcoinrpc.h for testing

events.body: I added a commit that moves the definition of CRPCTable and CRPCCommand to bitcoinrpc.h, so that it does not need to be duplicated in tests/rpc_tests.cpp. I suppose it is useful for #1075 as well. re-ACK?
